content: needs to be row 3 k1 p1 k1 moved forward once every 4 row to keep row 4 k2 kfb 4 sts track of the lace pattern there are a few ways row 5 k1 p1 k1 yo k1 5 sts to do this row 6 k2 yo k1 k2tog no sts increased or decreased a - use a ring marker move it forward 4 sts row 7 k1 p2 k1 yo k1 6 sts where indicated by slipping 4 sts pwise to the row 8 k2 yo k2 k2tog no sts increased or right needle removing the marker slipping decreased the 4 sts back to the left needle and replacing the marker on the right needle this is the method outlined in the instructions stockinette section b - you can move the ring marker on the note the outer edge on this shawl has a soft wrong side instead by working to the marker curl to it if you prefer a flat edge i would on row 3 removing it working 4 sts replacing suggest working 3 garter sts on the outer the marker this saves you slipping sts edge instead of 1 as follows c - you can use a removable marker and move row 1 ws k3 work to end as written below it 4 sts ahead when indicated instead of row 2 rs work as written to last 4 sts k2 slipping sts k2tog continue working the edge in this manner d - you can use 2 markers knit to 4 sts before when you come to the eyelet section first marker place second marker onto right needle work 4 sts remove first marker and set aside regular edge stitches cheat sheet rs row k2 yo work to last 2 sts k2tog ws row k1 work to last 2 sts k1 yo k1 #sillyheartshawl sillyheart shawl pg 4 set-up rs k2 yo knit to last 4 sts pm k2tog edge yo k2tog always slip the marker when you come to it note see resources on next page for help with knit-on edge it is knit back and forth row 1 ws k1 purl to last 2 sts k1 yo k1 1 st turning after each row and attaching to the increased live edge sts row 2 rs k2 yo knit to last 2 sts k2tog no sts with ws facing attach cc and co 3 sts with back- increased or decreased wards loop method next to the mc sts on the left needle row 3 repeat row 1 above set-up ws k2 k2tog with next mc st from row 4 k2 yo knit to 4 sts before marker slip edge turn next 4 sts pwise from left to right needle remove marker slip 4 sts back to left needle replace marker on right needle k2tog *yo k2tog* repeat row 1 rs wyif slip_stitch pwise move yarn to back k1 from * to * to end of row yo k1 4 sts note after replacing the marker
